name: enterprise-playwright-framework
description: Enterprise Playwright Test Automation Framework — Protected Distribution

scripts.clean:allure: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'allure-results'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { fs.rmSync(path, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('✅ Cleaned allure-results directory'); }"
scripts.clean:reports: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['allure-results', 'allure-report', 'playwright-report'].forEach(dir => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('✅ Cleaned ' + dir); } });"
scripts.clean:dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) { fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('✅ Cleaned dist directory'); }"
scripts.test: npm run clean:allure && npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean:allure && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.build:package: node scripts/build.js && node scripts/obfuscate.js && node scripts/package.js

author: Jade Business Services
